data.name: PasswordRequiresNonAlphanumeric
data.value: Password requires at least one non alphanumeric symbol

data.name: PasswordRequiresDigit
data.value: Password requires at least one digit

data.name: PasswordRequiresUpper
data.value: Password requires at least one upper case letter

data.name: PasswordRequiresLower
data.value: Passwords must have at least one lowercase ('a'-'z').

data.name: StringLength
data.value: The {0} must be at least {2} and at max {1} characters long.

data.name: PasswordConfirmationMatch
data.value: Password doesn't match to the confirmation
